snippet: Shares slid 5.65 percent to $25.57, their steepest drop on the New York Stock Exchange in more than two months.
abstract: AOL shareholders re-elect the company's eight-member board, handing a defeat to the activist hedge fund Starboard Value, which had sought to unseat three directors.
lead_paragraph: Shares slid 5.65 percent to $25.57, their steepest drop on the New York Stock Exchange in more than two months.

headline.seo: AOL Shareholders, Fending Off Challenge, Re-elect Board
headline.main: AOL Shareholders, Fending Off Challenge, Re-elect Board
headline.print_headline: AOL Shareholders, Fending Off Challenge, Re-elect Board
